channel.title: PollingSensor with Proxy Support
channel.description:
Hi all, I need to create a PollingSensor to query a remote API once per hour and then action on the results of that API call.
Any suggestions on how to get the sensor working through a proxy server? Is the Python Requests module used for http calls? Can I just add the proxy details? Thanks,
